title: Foscarini Diesel Inspired Fork Style Floor Lamp
body: This Fork Floor Lamp inspired by Diesel Collection exudes an impression of the rustic and practical lighting that is popular in camping activities. It features a polycarbonate diffuser that generates an even glow that shines through the textured and patchwork structure of the linen shade. The dainty stitches on the canvas mimic the designs of the Diesel jeans, creating a similar experience when you are in the outdoors or sleeping inside a tent. It comes with a hand-welded steel stand and flexible joints that let you rotate the shade and enjoy optimum lighting in any direction you want.
